content.rendered:
Looking for some marketing inspiration? The Center for Career & Professional Development at Centre College has released several animated videos on YouTube featuring tips for navigating Handshake—check them out!

Tips for Success at a Virtual Career Fair

How to Search for a Summer Internship on Handshake

Want to spotlight your Handshake story? Tell us here.

excerpt.rendered: Animated videos featuring tips for navigating Handshake
